Text: What's the deal with FM 2005 / CM5?

Two different games. FM 2005 is the evoluton of the old championship manager series, whereas CM 5 is a new game constructed by Eidos.

Eidos and SI worked together before, now they are producing competing football manager games. That's the story in brief.
How is this one different from the other release that has been uploaded here? Seems like they are identical...

It is a completely different game than FM 2005 made by Eidos.

FM 2005: www.sigames.com

CM 5: www.eidos.com

I have tried the game now. 

I can confirm that it works. I have just created my first save game with my beloved Liverpool.

Try it and compare it to FM 2005.
it is better than Football manager????

I'm not talking about the difference between FM05 and CM5! i'm talking about the release (CM5) that was uploaded here on Pirate Bay. It's the exact same one! Try using the search function once in a while...

Jävla skit-release!!! Har försökt med allt möjligt men det funkar fan inte! Nån som kan fixa en crack till spelet? Måste testa och se om det är värt att köpa.

Tar det på svenska hur man då fixar det här spelet utan att bränna det.

Det du behöver är:

Daemon tools v.3.47
subinacl  Här är länken : http://download.microsoft.com/download/1/7/d/17d82b72-bc6a-4dc8-bfaa-98b37b22b367/subinacl.msi 

När du har dessa program installerade så börjar du med att göra 2 genvägar till subinacl. Höger klicka på den ena genvägen och ta sen "egenskaper". Ta bort länken som står i mål och klistra in den här länken: 

"C:ProgramWindows Resource KitsToolssubinacl.exe"  /keyreg "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINEHARDWAREDevicemapSCSISCSI Port X" /deny=administratörer=r

OBS! För att kolla vilken port din daemon använder så går man in på "Kör" och skriver "regedt32". Bläddra er fram till "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/Hardware/Devicemap/Scsi" under mappen kommer ni hitta ett antal mappar där det kan står "Scsi Port 0" osv. Klicka på en av mapparna tills ni hittar det här:

http://club.cdfreaks.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=12889&stc=1 på vänstra sidan. Gör ni det så har ni hittat Daemons port nr som ni ska ersätta "X" med.

Nästa steg är att gå in på den andra genvägens egenskaper och klistrar in den här texten under "Mål":

"C:ProgramWindows Resource KitsToolssubinacl.exe"  /keyreg "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESYSTEMMountedDevices" /deny=administratörer=r

Verkställ!!

Nu är det bara att klicka på båda genvägarna en gång sen e det klart att mounta cdn med daemon och spela.

Blev något fel med första länken!
Det ska stå under "mål":
"C:Program FilesWindows Resource KitsToolssubinacl.exe"  /keyreg "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINEHARDWAREDevicemapSCSISCSI Port 1" /deny=administratörer=r

This Does work!!!  Remember if you have an english version of windows xp you've got to change the shortcuts to english.  Thankyou for uploading.

(1) "C:Program FilesWindows Resource KitsToolssubinacl.exe"  /keyreg "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINEHARDWAREDevicemapSCSISCSI Port 1" /deny=administrators=r

(2) "C:Program FilesWindows Resource KitsToolssubinacl.exe"  /keyreg "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESYSTEMMountedDevices" /deny=administrators=r

You dont need to find out the port number, just create the 2 shortcuts to the program downloaded, change the target in both to what I described earlier, and the mount the image.

When you delete the UAService7.exe file you have to delete the .pf file as well!! The files are found in the WINDOWS/system32 and WINDOWS/Prefetch direcories respectively

I´ve played all the CM for the last 8 years. CM has always been the king of the manager games. No other game has evan been near. Was confused when FM came but FM IS THE REAL CM. 
This game CM 5 IS NOTHING what CM used to be.
The people who made CM5 can not be the people who used to do CM.

I somehow maneged to do what don said and got it to work but after checking around I will not play CM5 anymoore.

The game started 1 februari 2005, the game came out this week and they still dont have my favoriteteam Häcken in the right leauge! (we won promotion in oct 2004!!!)

The players in the reserves and youth team are fukkin "non-real-players" haha. Real CM, now FM, would never embarres themselves like that.

My financial status was 10% of Häckens in real life. One of the most important players (in real life) Dioh Williams was a youngster haha.

But the thing that made it most B, was that it said that the transfer deadline had passed. Haha evan an amateur can find out that Swedens transfer deadline is 31/3...

Dont bother downloading this game, download or buy FM instead!

But thx anyways!!!
Its Alive =) Go Donpatricio
